text: Buckle up, Disney fans : High School Musical is just one of many DCOMs leaving Netflix in May. The streaming service is saying goodbye to a laundry list of Disney Channel Original movies, including the mega - hit HSM, as well its sequel, High School Musical 2, and the spin - off, Sharpay ’ s Fabulous Adventure. Both Camp Rock films and all three Cheetah Girls movies are leaving alongside one - off classics like Cadet Kelly, Cow Belles, Wendy Wu : Homecoming Warrior, and more. The DCOM exodus takes up most of this month ’ s list, but rom - coms Bridget Jones ’ s Diary and To Rome With Love are also on last call, as well as Ocean ’ s Eleven, GoodFellas, and The Hurt Locker.
